## Matrix4x4.transformPointP() method

Transform a point by this matrix and then do a perspective divide.

**Signature:**

```typescript
transformPointP(point: Vector3, result?: Vector3): Vector3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  point | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | The point to be transformed. |
|  result | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | _(Optional)_ The output vector, if not specified, a new vector will be created. |

**Returns:**

[Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md)

The output vector
